message.content:
cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SI

The paper deals with the analysis of multimedia content, specifically movies, using network models. This falls under the scope of multimedia (cs.MM) research. The paper also involves the use of textual semantic cues, such as subtitles and scripts, which suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of visual cues, which could involve computer vision (cs.CV) techniques. Finally, the paper proposes a new framework for video content representation and analysis, which could fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
